dataset_id: GPM Ground Validation UND Citation Navigation Data OLYMPEX V1
organizations: Global Hydrology Resource Center, Marshall Space Flight Center, NASA
title: GPM Ground Validation UND Citation Navigation Data OLYMPEX V1
summary: The GPM Ground Validation UND Citation Navigation Data OLYMPEX dataset supplies navigation data collected by the Cessna Citation II aircraft for flights that occurred during November 12, 2015 through December 19, 2015 for the Olympic Mountains Experiment (OLYMPEX) GPM Ground Validation field campaign. This navigation dataset consists of multiple altitude, pressure, temperature, airspeed, and ground speed measurements in ASCII format.
